bookSourceComment:
永久站：
https://fuhouse.club/bl
ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉
使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了
第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作
①复制永久站网址
②用浏览器打开该网址
③永久站网址会自动切换成可用网址
④复制当前可用网址
⑤将此源URL替换成复制的可用网址
注：
若两种情况都无法解决失效问题 
大概率网站改代码了 
随缘等人修复 主要看命
2022.7.10 酷安@乃星

<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleContent.content: header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-aym.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic." var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic + chapter_domain +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
    bytes.forEach(a => {
      bt = a & 0xff;
      if (bt < 16) {
        stringBuffer.append("0");
      }
      stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
    });
    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
</js>$.[*]

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".weui-panel__bd a || .item a"),
  data = [];
list == 0
  ? java.log("🎨UU韩漫💞：搜索失效，请修复")
  : ""
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: list[i].select("h3").text() + list[i].select(".title").text(),
    author: "",
    kind: "",
    word: "",
    latest: "",
    intro: list[i].select(".weui-media-box__desc").text(),
    cover:
      "https://nizhidaoma.bqulou.com/bookimages/" +
      String(list[i].attr("href")).replace(/.*\/(\d+).html/, "$1") +
      "/1.jpg",
    url: list[i].attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var data = [];
list = java.getElements(".weui-cells a");
list == "" ? list =java.getElements("#chapterlist li a") : list;
list == 0
  ? java.log("🎨UU韩漫💞：目录失效，请修复")
  : ""
t1 = String(java.getElements(".placeholder.f-red").text()).replace(/更新时间：|\s.*/g, "");
t2 = String(java.getElements(".update-time").text()).replace(/更新/, "");
t3 = String(java.getElements(".pt-info.3").text()).replace(/更新：|\s.*/g, "");
date = 
  t1 !== ""
    ? t1
    : t2 !== ""
    ? t2
    : t3;
for (i in list) {
  pages = String(list[i].text()).match(/\s(\d+)\s/)[1];
  data.push({
    title:
      i == list.length - 1
        ? `[${list.length}]·第${parseInt(i)+1}话 (${pages}P)〔${date}〕`
        : `第${parseInt(i)+1}话 (${pages}P)`,
    link:
      "bid=" +
      baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.html/)[1] +
      "&cid=" +
      String(list[i].attr("href")).match(/(\d+)/)[1] +
      "&pages=" +
      pages
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".sul li"),
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: list[i].select(".name").text(),
    author: String(list[i].select(".stext p")[1].text()).replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/")
      .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/"),
    kind: "",
    word: "",
    latest: "",
    intro: "",
    cover: list[i].select("img").attr("data-original"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1,
    "d+": this.getDate(),
    "H+": this.getHours(),
    "m+": this.getMinutes(),
    "s+": this.getSeconds()
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
var list = java.getElements("#detail-list-select li a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href"),
    isVip: i > 9 ? true : false
  });
};
flag == 1
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
$[*]

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
option = `{
  "charset":"utf-8",
  "headers":{
    "User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/82.0.4080.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/82.0.453.0",
    "Referer":"${host}"
  }
}`;
flag == 1
  ? `${host}/plus/search.php?q=${key},${option}`
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleSearch.author: $.author_name||$.author[*]||$.authors
ruleSearch.name: $.org_title||$.title##<.*?>
